# Question 1

```{r}
#Load the moderndive library

```


```{r}
#load dataset
data("early_january_weather")
```
This is a data set describing the weather at Newark Airport for each time period in January 2013. Specific variables include:`r names(early_january_weather) `

This is a dataset has `r nrow(early_january_weather) ` rows, and `r ncol(early_january_weather) ` columns. The average temperature in January is`r mean(early_january_weather$temp)
